Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4527 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.38-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-4527 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.38-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glibc is earlier than 2.38-11, affected by CVE-2023-4527
